biotools.summary: BSDD (Biomolecules Segment Display Device) searches for and displays user defined sequence motifs in known protein structures.  This web based tool incorporates the graphics package of RASMOL for visualization.

bioschemas.name: BSDD
bioschemas.summary: BSDD (Biomolecules Segment Display Device) searches for and displays user defined sequence motifs in known protein structures.  This web based tool incorporates the graphics package of RASMOL for visualization.
